text:
Created attachment 32500
Error logs

My tomcat web application stopped working after getting following error.

janv. 09, 2015 9:57:16 AM org.apache.tomcat.util.net.AprEndpoint$Poller run
Grave: Poller failed with error [610 038] : [APR does not understand this error code]

Tomcat version:7.0.47
tcnative version: 1.1.30
APR version: 1.4.8
OS vendor/version: Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1

Could you please help with what could be root cause of this error.

Please have attach error log.
Please let me know where I can copy dumps because they are large in size ( more than 100 MB)

Thanks & Regards,
Prithvi
creator: rahulsingh026@gmail.com

text: Upgrade to the latest 7.0.x release and retest please.
creator: markt@apache.org

text:
(In reply to Mark Thomas from comment #1)
> Upgrade to the latest 7.0.x release and retest please.

And upgrade the JVM.  That version (7u5) has been superseded for many, many years.  The current version is 7u75.
creator: chuck.caldarale@unisys.com

text: And the tc-native version too while you are at it.
creator: markt@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text:
No response from OP for almost a month and no information on how to reproduce.

Feel free to re-open if you still see this issue after upgrading as requested.
